org.spongepowered.api.util

Interface CatalogBuilder<C extends CatalogType,B extends ResettableBuilder<C,B>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResettableBuilder<C,B>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Advancement.Builder, AdvancementTree.Builder, DataRegistration.Builder<T,I>, Key.Builder<E,V>, ShapedCraftingRecipe.Builder.EndStep, ShapelessCraftingRecipe.Builder.EndStep, SmeltingRecipe.Builder.EndStep

    public interface CatalogBuilder<C extends CatalogType,B extends ResettableBuilder<C,B>>
extends ResettableBuilder<C,B>
    A base builder to construct CatalogTypes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods

      C build()
      Builds the CatalogType of type C.
      default B from(C value)
      Deprecated. 
      It's not allowed to duplicate catalog types.
      B id(String id)
      Sets the id of the CatalogType (without the namespace/plugin id).
      B name(String name)
      Sets the name of the CatalogType.

      • build

        C build()
 throws IllegalStateException
        Builds the CatalogType of type C.

        The last PluginContainer in the cause stack will be used to determine which plugin was used to construct the CatalogType.

        Returns:
        The built catalog type
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If not all required options were specified

      • from

        @Deprecated
default B from(C value)
        Deprecated. It's not allowed to duplicate catalog types.
        Description copied from interface: ResettableBuilder
        Resets this builder to the values of the given built object.
        Specified by:
        from in interface ResettableBuilder<C extends CatalogType,B extends ResettableBuilder<C,B>>
        Parameters:
        value - The built object
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining
